comment.author: 36899742@N00
comment._content: He's probably doing a lot of politicking here. He was making a strong bid for the Republican nomination at this time. But at the Republican convention a few weeks later (June 18-22, 1912), he lost the nomination to Taft, even though he won most of the primaries and caucuses.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information and context. Will submit for possible clarification to the catalog record.
